# Intro {.unnumbered}

## About {.unnumbered}

This is my professional diary tracking work completed with the Aleza Lake Research Forest. This has been authored using R, and [Quatro](https://quarto.org). Additionally, this document system allows me to track various projects including time and cost tracking.
